translations: 灌肠（enema 的复数形式）；灌肠剂

sentences.sentence: Local hospitals have reported an increasing demand for enemas in recent months which may be the result of food-tainted scandals at home and abroad, Shanghai Daily said Saturday.
sentences.translation: 《上海日报》3日称，可能由于近期国内外食品安全事件不断，前往当地医院洗肠的人数明显增多。
